title: Xerath q being global and hitting multiple people at once

embed.description: Some New Xerath Hack/Script/Bug Giving You GLOBAL Q Damage..RIOT DISABLE & FIX PLEASE!!!!!! "Like" if you want more! →1v1 VS RANK 1 PLAYER: http://bit.ly/2nB39ac →Subscribe For More!: http://full.sc/1gukNqq →My Stream: http://twitch.tv/redmercylol Follow me here! →My Stream: http://twitch.tv/redmercylol →My Twitter: http://twitter.com/RedmercyLoL →Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedmercyLoL →My Instagram: http://instagram.com/redmercylol →My 2nd YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/redmercygaming Redmercy Merchandising Now Available!

body: Currently, there is this buff or hack going on with {{champion:101}}  Q that makes it global and hit multiple targets are one.  Hopefully you can fix this mess.

replies.body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cJ_tkShCPCg
The hack creators commented on the video afaik

Oh c'mon now. The only time i see a post about Xerath in like 3 months its about scripts and hacks. Again! 
 FeelsXerathMan
Darn though.  Xerath's my main, don't want him disabled, but that can't be allowed to continue. :(
